hero.title: FortressAuth
hero.subtitle: Secure-by-Default Authentication
hero.description: A production-ready authentication library built with TypeScript and hexagonal architecture. Database-agnostic, email provider-agnostic, and secure by default.

secureByDefault.title: Secure by Default
secureByDefault.description: Argon2id password hashing with OWASP-recommended parameters, split session tokens, and timing-attack prevention

databaseAgnostic.title: Database Agnostic
databaseAgnostic.description: Works seamlessly with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite via Kysely query builder

emailAgnostic.title: Email Provider Agnostic
emailAgnostic.description: Pluggable email providers - console for development, Resend for production, or bring your own

productionReady.title: Production Ready
productionReady.description: Email verification, password reset, rate limiting (memory/Redis), account lockout, and session management

openApiDocs.title: OpenAPI Documentation
openApiDocs.description: Auto-generated API documentation with interactive Scalar UI for easy integration

dockerReady.title: Docker Ready
dockerReady.description: Multi-stage Dockerfile with security best practices and Docker Compose configuration

sdks.title: React & Vue SDKs
sdks.description: Cookie-aware authentication flows with React hooks and Vue composables for seamless integration

hexagonal.title: Hexagonal Architecture
hexagonal.description: Clean separation between business logic and infrastructure with zero dependencies in core

code.title: Simple Integration
code.description: Get started with just a few lines of code

demo.title: Try It Live
demo.description: Experience FortressAuth in action with our interactive demo

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.description: Complete API reference with interactive examples

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.description: Get up and running in minutes

examples.title: Code Examples
examples.description: React, Vue, and Node.js integration examples

footer.tagline: Built with hexagonal architecture • Zero infrastructure dependencies in core
